Musea Theme

ART GALLERY AND MUSEUM THEME

With Musea your new online presentation will embody the true spirit of art; create a beautiful exhibition of your own today!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1569836496818{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”qodef-iwt-shadow”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1569578971262{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Main Home

Grid Home

Passepartout Home

Museum Home

Art Gallery

Fullscreen Showcase

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Great on all screens Responsive design Your new website is sure to be a true thing of beauty on absolutely every device type and screen size it is being viewed on. Musea is fully responsive and retina-ready, which means your art gallery site will look stunning even on high-density retina screens. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1572255018811{padding-bottom: 61px !important;}”][vc_column]
Premade layouts

INNER PAGES

We made sure to include all the templates a modern museum or gallery can need, including pages for tickets, venues, & more.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

eCommerce Online store You can create a museum gift shop, or just about any type of online store you wish - Musea is fully compatible with the most popular & free eCommerce plugin, the WooCommerce, and equipped with remarkable set of shop list and product single layouts. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Museum & gallery All for Events Integrated with a neat module for displaying all the info about your events. This includes both show list & single pages, as well as an event list and event ticket template – in one word, if you wish to showcase events, you’re in the right place. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Start blogging Blog layouts Start a new art blog and attract the attention of your readers in a truly captivating manner. Musea makes this as easy as it can get for you, as it comes packed with a great collection of blog list and single post templates that are just waiting for your content. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Easily sell Event Tickets Musea provides you with a clean-cut, streamlined way to sell tickets to your events. The theme is fully compatible with the Tickera WordPress Event Ticketing plugin, and it’s bundled with a neat predesigned layout for featuring prices for different events. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Feature your Pricing Plans We thought of every single aspect when it comes to contemporary art gallery or museum websites. This is why, among many other features, we decided to include a template for displaying different types of pricing packages for your visitors or members. View more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column]

Musea Theme

Set Up an Exhibition Worthy of your Gallery

Buy theme
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
